name: Coffee Shop RPG
description:
Play Coffee Shop RPG now for FREE!

Situated in the middle of a fast-paced and chaotic multiverse, Coffee Shop RPG is a place to stop by for a tranquil drink before return to any of the myriad multiplayer experiences on Core. 

Features:

  • An in-game arcade
  •  Business cards that will transport you to another game
  •  Biweekly multiverse newspaper with solvable sudoku
  •  Absolutely no parkour whatsoever
  • Coffee!

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/slinkous
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ZazLinkous
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/disastronautics/
Discord: https://discord.gg/wU6W7UWAFD
